nodes.text: A vibrobayonet was an advanced version of the bayonet. It consisted of a vibroblade that attached to the barrel of a blaster rifle or other rifle, thus turning into a powerful melee weapon. A vibrobayonet detached from a rifle could be used as a vibrodagger.

Many elite commando units routinely carried blaster rifles paired with a vibrobayonet. For example the Mandalorian Supercommandoes carried a light repeating blaster with a vibrobayonet attachment, and the Taloron Hunters routinely carried a blaster carbine with a vibrobayonet. Other known users of vibrobayonets included Trandoshan mercenaries, and the Rebel Alliance guerrilla fighter Biv Bodhrik.
